channel.title: Study on krejac's notes
channel.description: Recent content in Study on krejac's notes

item.title: Studying Hard...
item.description: So I’ve signed up for a Certified Ethical Hacker (CEH) and I’d like to go through the course material before taking the course. But between work and family, studying tend to loose. I don’t really know what to do about it other than to read a bit here and there on the train going to and from work (if I can keep my eyes open) and a bit before I go to sleep at night.
